title: Paying well for a t209 printing error/ghost/oddity *Either Series is fine*
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Paying well for a t209 printing error/ghost/oddity *Either Series is fine*
posts.post_content:
Just looking for some sort of a printing goof or other oddity from the t209 series.  Could be a missing color, a wet sheet transfer, a heavy miscut, a blank back...etc.etc...

Thanks in advance,
Brian

Still looking for a printing mishap/ghost or anything from either of the t209 series.  This is one of the few mainstream sets that I don't have at least some sort of a goof for so I'd really appreciate someone parting with one :)

Brian,

It's been forever since you posted this, but have you found one yet?  I have a color McGeehan that doesn't have his factory-printed name at the bottom.  Instead, someone has hand-written it in what looks like period fountain pen (on the back also).  Not sure if that is "odd" enough for you.  Let me know and i'll send a scan.

Doug
